EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM Improving your (legacy) Application with Spring.Confirmation 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Improving your (legacy) Application with Spring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Improving your (legacy) Application with Spring with Marten Deinum. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html <http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html>. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, May 12, 2015 {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}} Europe: 3:00pm GMT Summer Time (London, GMT+01:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e8263893841a9ee94f6b0da4ce06897fd> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 663 133 794 Thank you,
